long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The  Proctortrack One is a custom chrome extension designed to facilitate an easy, secure, private and non-intrusive experience for taking remote proctoring exams sponsored by your College/University/Institution.  Proctortrack One Extension prevents unauthorized remote access, proctor tester behavior and verify remote compliance with test rules via secure screen sharing and using your webcam.

Before starting the test, the test taker has to allow webcam capture and screen capturing so that the system can check for any kind of violations by the test taker while attempting the test. After you complete your test/exam, test takers should follow steps to return to this page and uninstall the plugin as the final step in your testing process.
